summary.span: 获取或设置将列与数据源中的属性关联的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.

value.span: 用于表示列数据绑定的对象。

span.span: The object that represents the data binding for the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许指定数据网格的属性列要绑定到。The property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's to bind to. 有关绑定路径的详细信息，请参阅中的"绑定路径语法"一节[绑定声明概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md)。For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md).
